name: Balyasny Europe Asset Management LLP
goal: We are a multi-strategy investment firm that's dedicated to delivering uncorrelated performance and providing clients with world-class service. As a firm, we leverage our collective knowledge of industries, strategies, regions and markets to uncover investment ideas and deliver value to our clients.
euInitiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files currently followed by our organization include MiFID II, GDPR, etc however this is primarily done working with trade associations.
